text:
[Verse]
Bags are packed let's hit the road
Got no plans just watch us go
Sky so wide it sings our song
Day and night we'll chase along

[Verse 2]
Mountains high and oceans deep
Nature's call we can't keep
Towns and fields we'll pass them by
Feel the thrill as we fly

[Chorus]
Wanderlust dreams
Take us on
Through the streams
Far and wide
No in-betweens
Just you and me living scenes

[Verse 3]
City lights and desert sands
Holding tight you grab my hand
Stars will guide our sleepless nights
In this world our boundless flights

[Bridge]
Leaving all behind we chase
Mystic lands and hidden place
Winds of change we won't erase
Wanderlust our endless grace

[Chorus]
Wanderlust dreams
Take us on
Through the streams
Far and wide
No in-betweens
Just you and me living scenes
title: Wanderlust Dreams
